record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to a period of morning business until 12:30 p.m., with Senators permitted to speak therein, after Senator Enzi completes his remarks immediately following mine, for up to 15 minutes each--Senator Enzi can speak for whatever time he feels appropriate--that at 12:30 p.m., the Senate stand in recess until 2:15 p.m.; that upon reconvening, the Senate resume consideration of S. 1348, the immigration legislation.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
